meta.label: Truncate saved models split data
meta.description: Truncates "old" train and test split data stored in saved models to the first x lines. This can strongly reduce disk space usage but will prevent from using "Predicted data" and "Charts" on predicted data

params.name: age
params.label: Max age (days)
params.description: Truncate splits data for saved models older than this

params.name: lines
params.label: Number of rows
params.description: Truncate data to this many rows

params.name: performDeletion
params.label: Perform deletion
params.description: If not checked, only lists what would be touched

adminParams.name: ignoredProjects
adminParams.label: Ignored projects
adminParams.description: Projects to ignore. Separate project keys by ','

adminParams.name: includedProjects
adminParams.label: Included projects
adminParams.description: Projects to include. Separate project keys by ','
